name: Flow (itch) (Abhishek Pardhi)
description:
Goal: Your task as being a Light Source is to escape from the Black Hole and gain as much high a score as possible. You have to make sure you don't lose your intensity while traveling through the dark space!

Main Character of this game: Light source flowing through deep space with time <3

Tip: You will get to know more about the game when you start playing it. The options menu(which includes the About and Controls menu) has all things contained in it to start playing the game quickly and enjoy the game.

Contributors: Abhishek Pardhi, Soham Samaddar, Prakhar Pratap Mall, Abhishek Mishra, Ayush Gupta.

[Project Run: 4-11 Oct 2021]
